ISSUE.TITLE: Missing webhooks when commit message is big
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I had to run this on drone 0.3 `alter table commits alter column commit_message type varchar;` the commit message was limited to 255 characters and it was causing missing webhooks. ``` 2015/09/29 20:19:00 Unable to persist commit bbd96e4c1908177b81b4b3a8e77c3aaf8aea9974@develop. meddler.Insert: DB error in QueryRow: pq: value too long for type character varying(255) ```
